contentencoded:
Kevin Roose, writer for New York Magazine and Shannon Bond, reporter for FT, look back on the week's news. 

Get prepped for your own brunch:

LA Times: Snapchat could become latest start-up to reach a $10-billion valuation

Time: Martha Stewart: Why I Love My Drone

Salon: There’s now an app to help couples get divorced

The Wire: Barry Diller Stands Behind Tinder and Its CEO Amidst Sexual Harassment Allegations
teaser: Kevin Roose of NY Mag and Shannon Bond from FT look back on the week's news.
title: Weekend Brunch: Snapchat, Martha Stewart's drones, and Tinder
description: Kevin Roose of NY Mag and Shannon Bond from FT look back on the week's news.
